definition: The muscular organ that pumps blood through the body
examples: The heart beats approximately 100,000 times per day

definition: The pressure of blood against the walls of arteries
examples: Normal blood pressure is around 120/80 mmHg

definition: A closed loop through which electric current flows
examples: The circuit board contains multiple electronic components

definition: A legally binding agreement between two or more parties
examples: They signed a contract for the sale of the property
